Package RRPSS

Class Table

java.lang.Object
RRPSS.Table
Direct Known Subclasses:
EightSeats, FourSeats, SixSeats, TenSeats, TwoSeats
public abstract class Table extends Object
Represents the tables within the restaurant. Table Class contains the Order and Reservation class. Restaurant can have multiple tables, but only one table array.
Author:
YANGY
